sentences.en: A hominid is really any extinct ape more closely related to us than the chimpanzee.
sentences.cn: 原始人类中任何一个灭绝的猿物种和我们的关系都比黑猩猩更密切。

sentences.en: As a physical anthropologist, I have studied early hominid bones and reconstructed specimens of our predecessors.
sentences.cn: 身为体质人类学家, 我曾研究过早期人类及人类祖先的骨头,也曾重建人类祖先的样貌.
以灭绝的非洲原始人类。

sentences.en: From one perspective, the development of a very small penis could be considered the next step in male hominid evolution.
sentences.cn: 从这一角度看，在原始男性进化中，非常小阴茎的男人在下一步可能优先考虑发展。

sentences.en: H. erectus is generally believed to be the direct ancestor of modern humans and also the first hominid to live in caves and tame fire.
sentences.cn: 人们通常认为直立人是现代人的直接祖先，也是第一个生活在洞穴中和学会用火的原始人类。

sentences.en: Hominid their children, not to worry maid abuse, neglect of school discipline.
sentences.cn: 原始人自己带孩子, 不用担佣人虐待 、 学校疏于管教.

sentences.en: In 1927, at Chou - k'ou - tien, near Peking, a hominid lower molar of unusual pattern was discovered.
sentences.cn: 1927年, 在北京附近的周口店发现一颗形状异常的人类下臼齿.

sentences.en: The ETI would be to us as we would be to this early hominid — godlike.
sentences.cn: 这个ETI对我们来说,就如同我们之于这位古早的人类祖先——像上帝一样.

sentences.en: The several branches of early hominid were not immune to the changes in climate.
sentences.cn: 早期人科动物的不同分支在气候变化中也未能幸免.

words.tran_cn: 回家的；自动导引的；有返回性的

trans.tran_en: a member of a group of animals which includes human beings and also the animals from whom humans developed

trans.tran_cn: 原始人类； 灵长目动物
trans.tran_en: a member of a group of animals which includes human beings and also the animals from whom humans developed
